title: Episode 171: Lake Shawnee Amusement Park
description:
This week we are getting spooky with it. You might be an amusement park junkie, but we’re warning you, hold on to your butts if you’re headed to the Lake Shawnee Amusement park. Alaina gives us the intense history surrounding the land before it became a park, the horrible events that happened while it was a functioning park and the aftermath of the defunct park today. We’re serious, you’re going to want to be holding on tight to that butt!
Books used for research: Kentucky Clay by Katherine Bateman
Haunted America by Dave Thompson 
As always thank you to our sponsors
